name: Status
description: Collects and processes status messages from other nodes

initialActive.label: Initial active
initialActive.description: Starts the node in active state

help.description: Collects and aggregates status information from other SmartHome Helper nodes. Can be activated/deactivated based on conditions.

activeCondition.name: activeCondition
activeCondition.description: Message matching configured matchers activates/deactivates status collection

payload.name: payload
payload.description: Status message containing node status and text information

details.text: Collects status updates from other SmartHome Helper nodes within the configured scope: Global (all flows), Flow (current flow), or Group (current group).
Configure matchers to define activation conditions. When matched, the node becomes active and starts outputting status messages.
Status messages include both status values (msg.status) and status text (msg.statusText) from connected nodes.
Use 'Initial active' to start collecting status immediately when the flow starts.
Useful for creating centralized dashboards, monitoring multiple nodes, or triggering actions based on aggregated status.
